shorts.title: Artist Janet Pierce: ‘We arrived into Northern Ireland at the height of the Troubles, was forced to confront some of life’s darkest realities’

shorts.title: West Nile identified in more mosquitoes; still no human cases in county
shorts.title_distilled: West Nile identified in more mosquitoes; still no human cases in county.
shorts.description: Six more mosquitoes tested positive for West Nile virus in Lackawanna County, raising the total number this season to 25. But there hasn't been a case reported in humans.
shorts.content: Six more mosquitoes tested positive for West Nile virus in Lackawanna County, raising the total number this season to 25. But there hasn't been a case reported in humans.
shorts.content_distilled: Six more mosquitoes tested positive for West Nile virus in Lackawanna County, raising the total number this season to 25.

shorts.title: Sister Mary Persico, I.H.M., recognized with AICUP Award
shorts.description: Sister Mary Persico, I.H.M., Ed.D., Marywood president emerita and director of special projects, this year’s winner of the Association of Independent Colleges and Universities of Pennsylvania’s Francis J. Michelini Award for Outstanding Service to Higher Education, accepts a special proclamation from state Sen. Marty Flynn, D-22, Dunmore, who is a Marywood alumnus.
shorts.content: Sister Mary Persico, I.H.M., Ed.D., Marywood president emerita and director of special projects, this year’s winner of the Association of Independent Colleges and Universities of Pennsylvania’s Francis J. Michelini Award for Outstanding Service to Higher Education, accepts a special proclamation from state Sen. Marty Flynn, D-22, Dunmore, who is a Marywood alumnus.

shorts.title: People celebrate Labor Day at the Wyoming County Fair
shorts.title_distilled: People celebrate Labor Day at the Wyoming County Fair.
shorts.description: Some people may have been at a campfire or BBQ on Labor Day, but some decided to celebrate at the Wyoming County Fair, the only fair in NEPA open for the holiday.

shorts.title: Shoppers flock to Scranton Farmers Market for summer’s final harvest
shorts.title_distilled: Shoppers flock to Scranton Farmers Market for summer’s final harvest.
shorts.description: On Labor Day, shoppers packed the Co-Op Farmers Market in Scranton to grab late-summer produce as fall crops begin rolling in.
